entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 01:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
